metadata.title: CVE-2015-1820 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: REST client for Ruby (aka rest-client) before 1.8.0 allows remote attackersto conduct session fixation attacks or obtain sensitive cookie informationby leveraging passage of cookies set in a response to a redirect.

criterions.comment: ruby-rest-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
